attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enforce more strictly the current rules regarding the weekly farse of receiving "job seekers allowance. Shortly after making the bone idle get out of their beds and work we could start turning back the would be imigrants because of the lack of jobs available. More english people on the local housing list would then stand a chance of being housed, of course they would still be subordinate to every other minority group in england.

rejection.details: Your name has been identified in the petition.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
